channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Acrobat and Reader
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Acrobat and Reader

item.title: CVE-2020-3805|2024-08-04T07:44:50.901Z -- adobe -- adobe%20acrobat%20and%20reader
item.description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader versions 2020.006.20034 and earlier, 2017.011.30158 and earlier, 2017.011.30158 and earlier, 2015.006.30510 and earlier, and 2015.006.30510 and earlier have a use-after-free vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution .

item.title: CVE-2020-3747|2024-08-04T07:44:50.251Z -- adobe -- adobe%20acrobat%20and%20reader
item.description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader versions 2019.021.20061 and earlier, 2017.011.30156 and earlier, 2017.011.30156 and earlier, and 2015.006.30508 and earlier have an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure .

item.description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader versions 2020.006.20034 and earlier, 2017.011.30158 and earlier, 2017.011.30158 and earlier, 2015.006.30510 and earlier, and 2015.006.30510 and earlier have an insecure library loading (dll hijacking) vulnerability.
